casebody.data:
LOOMAN REALTY CORPORATION, ET AL., PLAINTIFFS-PETITIONERS, v. THE BROAD STREET NATIONAL BANK, ET AL., DEFENDANTS-RESPONDENTS. Messrs. Kahn, Schildhraut & Levy for the petitioners. Messrs. Wicoff & Voorhees, Mr. John J. Connell, Messrs. Milton, Keane & Be Bona, and Mr. Allan E. Klinger for the respondents. June 11, 1962.

See same case below: 74 N. J. Super, 71.
